meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Specification of public offices
section.content: A public office mentioned in column 1 of the Schedule is specified for the purposes of the Ordinance, or a provision of the Ordinance, mentioned in column 2 of the Schedule opposite to that public office.
